short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Arrow keys to fly, Z, X, and C to fire. Collect gems to upgrade your ship.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a fun retro-style space game. Currently has 10 unlockable ships (collect 30 gems to progress to the next ship), and an INFINITE number of increasingly difficult levels (kill the enemy ship to progress a level).
